`tsCeatures` is a simple R package for the computation of a few time-series features coded in C++ for scalability and efficiency. You can install `tsCeatures` from GitHub:

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("hendersontrent/tsCeatures")
```
